GSP29nvtp1_2u:5: sa ca parārtho 'pi pṛcchopakramapratiyoginyekavaktṛke vicāre vivicya pravarttanīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:7: nyāyasya dūṣaṇopakramapratiyoginī tu nānāpravaktṛke kathānāmni kriyāvyatihāre pravartyaṃ vivecanīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:10: dvitīyāhnikārthastu pravartanavivecana upālambhaparapadārthalakṣaṇamiti yukta idānīṃ tasyārambhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:11: tatrāpi pravartyavivecanīyadvāreṇa pravṛttiprakāratvācca kathāyāḥ prathamaṃ kathāprakaraṇamārabhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:14: anyathā hi vādādilakṣaṇasya pūrvāparaprakaraṇāpraveśāt āhnikāpraveśe śāstrabahirbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:15: atha sūtrakṛtaiva kathā kathaṃ sākṣāt noddiṣṭa,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:17: tad yathā caturṣu pramaiva vivakṣitaṃ phalamiti pramāṇatvena,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:23: tāni ca na kathāmātrasādhyānīti viśeṣata evoddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:24: tatra yaugikaṃ kathāśabdamupādāyānavasaradusthatayā bhāṣyam ākṣipya vārttikena samādhatte---tadayuktamityādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:25: nāyaṃ kathāśabdo yogamātrānurodhī, api tu satyeva tasmin rūḍhiniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:28: sa ca na kathāyā āśrayaḥ kiṃ tu viṣaya ityata āha---vicāraviṣayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:34: te dve api tisra eveti niyamayatā nirākṛte /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:36: na hi prathamasādhananivṛttāveva tattvanirṇayaḥ, niḥsādhanasya tasyānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:38: yadi tu pratipakṣasādhanamanirūpyaiva vijigīṣuvitaṇḍāvat tāvataiva vādinau kṛtinau,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:41: na ca vijayatattvanirṇayābhyāṃ phalāntaramavaśiṣyate kathāyāḥ, yadarthaṃ vādavitaṇḍā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:42: anutpannasya hi tattvanirṇayasyotpādanam, utpannasya pālanam, pālitasya ca viniyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:45: nanvetāvatāpi na sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāvitamityata āha---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:52: tathā ca svasthaḥ sarvañjanapratyayānapalāpī matamātrāvalambī avahito 'kalahakāraśceti kathādhikāriṇo darśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:56: te 'pi prakṛtoktiko 'vipralambhako yathākālasphūrtikaḥ anākṣepako yuktisiddhasaṃpratyayī ceti pañca vāde upādeyāḥ viparyayeṇa heyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:57: evaṃ bhūtāśca viṣyādaya eva prāyeṇeti ta evoktāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:58: evaṃ ca sati heyān vihāya yo yathābhūtaḥ sa tathābhūtena vaktumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:60: na hi yuyutsuriraṃsū pratipadya ciraṃ asiddhaṃ saṃbhūya samīhitaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:74: tadgatākṣepastu uddeśa eva pramāṇatarkaśabdasya sādhanopālambhaśabdavat svavācakalakṣaṇayā vā,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:78: na ca acetano 'parādhyati, nāpi pratipādyate, kiṃ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:83: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, yat karmatvadaśāyāṃ śabdāderanityatvaṃ dharmo karmakaraṇayorapi karmaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:87: anyathā tu viṣayaḥ śaktiviṣayaḥ śakyaṃ kāryamiti yāvadityevamapi sugamametat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:88: atra hi jalpe nigrahasthānaviniyogādityādibhāṣye na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:89: itivad vāde sarvanigrahasthānapratiṣedhe agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheta itivat siddhāntāviruddha ityādiviśeṣavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:91_1: pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ itivat parisaṃkhyānārthamuttarapadārambha iti vyākhyātavān /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:96: upālambhapadena nirāśaṅkameva pratipāditatvāt ityata āha---niyamaḥ parisaṃkhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:97: ayamarthaḥ, yadyapi vidhiratyantamaprāptau niyamaḥ pākṣike sati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:98: tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyeti kīrtyate //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:106: pratijñāntaraṃ hetvantaramajñānamapratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇamiti saptakam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:109: kiñcicca kathāvasānikaṃ yathā, hetvābhāso niranuyojyānuyogaśceti dvayamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:110: tatra hānyādīnāmaśaktisaṃguhanaprakāratvāt, tattvabubhutsutayā ca vāde tadabhāvāt teṣāmasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:114: hetvābhāsānudbhāvane niranuyojyānuyogānudbhāvane ca pāramparyavyāghāto vyāsaṅgādīnā tatsāmagrīpratirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:115: tatrādhikānudbhāvane prathamo yadi na syāt, tathāpi dvitīyaḥ syādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:124: apasiddhānte saṃmukhapramāṇabādhākrāntiriti ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsattimattayā pratisaṃhitaṃ pramāṇāntarāpratihataṃ ca vākyaṃ tattvapratipatteraṅgam, nānyathā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:126: tadetat sarvamabhiprāyaṃ niyamayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmataṃ sūtrādeva ca labhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:128: na tu niyamaḥ kṛta iti vyājena darśayati---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:132: tathāpyasmin pakṣe kimasya prayojanamityata āha---sādhanopālambhaviśeṣaṇāya ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:137: stheyānāṃ tu vādasthānakathāviśeṣavyavasthāpanaṃ pūrvottaravādasthāpanaṃ vivadamānayorguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ bhagnaprativādiprabodhanaṃ loke niṣpannakathāphalapratipādanaṃ ca karmāṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:138: etadarthaṃ ca tatra prāśnikopayogo yad vādinau kāraṇagraheṇa evaṃ kartumaśaktau /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:140: tatra tayoreva vītarāgatayā śaktatvādityāśayavānāha---na vāde prāśnikānāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:141: tat kiṃ parivarjanameva tatra teṣām? netyāha---daivāgatānāṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:149: tathā hi yadi pūrvasādhanaṃ dūṣitam, nigṛhītastarhi vādī, jitaṃ dvitīyena /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:151: na dūṣitaṃ cet---uttarābhāsavacanena cāvacanena ca nigṛhītastarhi dvitīyo,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:155: yathā hi vāde svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca tattvanirṇayo na viparyaye,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:156: tathā jalpe 'pi svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca vijayo viparyaye bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:158_0: tadayaṃ jalprapavṛttikramaḥ vādini sādhanamātraṃ prayujya saṃkṣepato vistarato vā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:158_1: ābhāsān uddhṛtya virate sati ucyamānagrāhyanigrahāprāptau ābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābhe
GSP29nvtp1_2u:161: tasminnapyevaṃ virate sati anuktocyamānagrāhyanigrahālābhe tadvavacanamavagamyānūdya dūṣaṇāṅgaṃ prati dūṣyābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābheda prathamavādī sthāpanāṃśaṃ dūṣayet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:165: śarasandhānasamaya eva yo mūrcchitaḥ tadvāṇavāraṇatatpraharaṇānuṣṭhānavad viphalatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:172: yadyapi nigrahasthānapadenāviśeṣāt sarvaprāptau siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapanna iti padadvayātideśo mandaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:173: tathāpi gorbalīvardanyāyenāpi yathāśrutabhāṣyopapattau kṛtaṃ tadbhāṅgeneti manyamāno bhāṣyaṃ vārttikena samañjasayannāha---uktamātramityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:181: pareṇa sādhusādhanopādāne ca kṛta ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:184: prakāre bhāṣyam asaṃgatam, na tu prayojane /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:191: tathātve vā kṛtaṃ jalpena prayāsabahulena, antataḥ satpratipakṣatayāpi dvitīyasādhanapraveśāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:198: vādinorabhiprāyavaśādanuvidheyastheyānurodhāt veti na kiñcidetat dvitīyasādhanapraveśasatu dūṣaṇatayā na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:203: na caivamastviti vācyam, jalpe 'pi parapakṣāghātasya gatatvenātivyāpakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:204: mātragrahaṇāt tu tannivṛttiriti cet---na, tena sādhanānivṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:212: tatra sādhanavādinā prathamatastadābhāsaparihāre dūṣaṇavādināpi saduttaraparigrahe yatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:213: saduttarālābhe hi asaduttarāvatāra iti śikṣārthaṃ hetvābhāsāḥ prathamaṃ chalādibhya uddiṣṭā iti saiva saṃgatirihāpītyāha---uddeśeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:214_0: atra triṣoḍaśyāṃ vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena yā dviṣoḍaśī sā asiddhaviśeṣaṇāsiddhaviśeṣyā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:224: atraiva punarāśrayāsiddhiṃ prakṣipyāparaṃ dvānavataṃ śatam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:231: yasya hyavasaro nāsti, tasyārthakriyā prati vicārataḥ sattvaṃ nāstīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:233: yastu svayameva nāsti, tasya deśakālāvasthāvirodhasāmarthānāṃ nāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:245: durgraho 'siddhaḥ, asiddhāśrayo 'pi kaścit heturiti paramatanirākaraṇāvaṣṭambhena tatsiddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:246: durgrahataraḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ, bādhakasyānanyathāsiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpya tatsiddheriti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:250: nanu vibhāgasūtre savyabhicāra ityuddiṣṭaṃ padamiha māṣyakāro lakṣaṇatvenaiva vyācaṣṭe /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:251: evaṃ coddiṣṭaṃ na lakṣitam, lakṣitaṃ ca noddiṣṭamityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:252: tathāpi lakṣaṇe vaktavye padaniruktiḥ kvopayujyate ityata āha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:253: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyata iti anvayato vyatirekato vā sādhyenaiva sahacarito dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:262: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ sarvo 'yamityādi vārtikamityata āha---avagatam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:266: athāyamarthaḥ, na tatrāyamanvayato vyatirekato vā niyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:274: tatra sarvasya vā kasyacid vā yo dharmo hetutayopātta ubhāvantau sādhyadharmatadviparyayau āśritya prasajya pravartate dharmiṇi so 'naikāntika iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:276: vyatirekiṇyeva hi dharme sādhye 'naikāntikaḥ saṃbhavatprayogo na tvavyatirekiṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:278: tat kathaṃ tatpratiṣedha ityata āha---paryudāsapakṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:280: na hi goghaṭādāvabrāhmaṇa iti vaktāro bhavanti,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:289: tayoḥ satorayaṃ vā mīmāṃsakābhimato viśeṣavirodho 'pi viruddha syādityapi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:291: siddhāntaśabdenātra pakṣo vivakṣito 'to na prakṛtahānaṃ nāpyapasiddhāntavaiyarthyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:293: abhyupetya ityanena pratijñāyeti vivakṣitam, na tvabhipretyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:294: na ca viśeṣaḥ pratijñāyate 'pi tu abhipreyate na ca tathābhūtena virodhopalambhasaṃbhavo 'siddhidaśāyāmanupambhena siddhidaśāyāṃ sahopalambhenānavasaraparāhatatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:296: svārthānumānasamaye prakṛtopapādakatayā tatsiddheḥ anupapādakastu viśeṣo na sidhyati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:298: tadāpi kathaṃ sarvathānupalabdhacaraḥ sidhyatītyapi na vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:303: syādetat, virodhe hi heturna syāt sādhya vā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:307: anyatarāniścaye 'pi sandigdhāsiddha ityāśakṅkyoktaṃ vārttikakṛtā yasmādamyupagataṃ bādhata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:311: kiṃ tvayameva sisādhayipitaṃ bādhata iti vārttikārthaḥ sugama eva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:323: virodhanigrahasthānādetasyāmedamāśaṅkya yathā parihṛtaṃ vārttikakṛtā, tadanurodhena vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:330: tadyathā dhūmavānayaṃ yogyasya satastadvattayā anupalabhyamānatvāt, niragnikatvāt, jalāśayatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:338: iha khalu hetvābhāsānāṃ tattyānusaṃhitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ saṃśayo vivakṣitaviparītajñānaṃ jijñāsā ajñānaṃ vyāptibādhaśceti phalāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:341: yasmāt prakriyamāṇārthajijñāsāmātraṃ bhavati sa prakarasama iti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:342: tathāhi, pakṣe samabalabādhakasahapravṛtterna tattvanirṇayaḥ, pratibalena pratiruddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:347: tasmādekāṃ koṭimupanayan samabalena pratiruddhaḥ kathamatra nirṇayo bhavatviti jijñāsāṃ janayan prakaraṇasama itarebhyo bhidyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:354: tathāpi saṃśayānuvṛttinivṛttyoḥ jijñāsānuvṛttinivṛttī iti mattvoktam---tatra sandigdhe tadvā jijñāsate iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:355: nanu yata eva jijñāsā kathaṃ tameva prekṣāvān tattvanirṇayāya prayokṣyata ityata āha---vicitrābhisandhitayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:356: pūrvasamayo duṣpratyayo jātu prayojyabuddhiriti hi sādhanottarābhāsaprayoge hetava ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:358: nanu vyutpattimāśritya cet prakaraṇasamapadaṃ pravartate kṛtaṃ tarhi yasmādityādilakṣaṇāntareṇetyata āha---vyutpattīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:359: athaitadeva pravṛttinimittaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha---anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:360: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa savyabhicārāt prakaraṇasamaṃ bhedayatā tasya saṃśayahetutvamasya ca prakaraṇapravṛttihetutvamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:361: tacca saṃmugdham, pakṣapratipakṣau prakaraṇam iti prāgvyākhyānāt, sūtravirodhācca /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:362: na hi yasmāt prakaraṇamiti sūtramapi tu yasmāt prakaraṇacinteti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:367: nanu nityadharmānupalabdhiḥ kādācitkī vivakṣitā, sadātanī vā?
GSP29nvtp1_2u:370: na hi nityadharmopalabdhyā śabde kadācidapi na bhavitavyam iti pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:371: tathā cāsiddhatvaṃ vihāya kutaḥ prakaraṇasamatvamudbhāvayatītyata āha---na ca tattvānupalabdhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:375: yastūpalambhābhāvena sulabhāmanupalabdhiṃ matvā viśeṣamapratisandhāya pratibalena ca pratibandhamupanyasyati,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:376: taṃ prati kimayamābhāsatāṃ yātu na vā? na tāvanna yāti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:380: na ca tadānīṃ doṣāntaramatra parisphurati, anyatra pratibalena pratibandhāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:381: yatrāpi yugapadanekadoṣaparisphuraṇam, tatrāpi satpratipakṣatvam apyudbhāvya viramyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:382: na hi yāvadasti tāvadudbhāvyam, anyatra saṃbhūya pratijñāyāṃ sarvatrodbhāvananiyamāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:388: ekasmin pakṣe ubhayapadaṃ vihāyāparasmin vyāvṛttidvāreti padamadhyāhṛtya phakkikābodhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:390: evaṃ jijñāsāhetutvābhāvāt prakaraṇasamalakṣaṇāyogitayā śarīrādanyatvaṃ na tadudāharaṇamityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:395: nāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāmanupalabdhyoranyayorvā dharmayoḥ kaścit viśeṣo gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāṃ tu yathānyasyānyatra hetvābhāse 'ntarbhāvaḥ tathānupalabdherapīti sāpi tyājyā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:408: asiddha ityasyāpi pakṣadharmatayā na niścita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:416: eteṣāṃ cāniścayaḥ sandehād vā, abhāvaniścayād veti na kaścit phalaṃ prati viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:417: etena vyomapadmāṃ sugandhi padmātvāt ityādayo 'pi saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:419: yathā hi, asati sapakṣe vipakṣe ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartu na śakyate, tathā pakṣe 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:426: tejasābhibhūtatvāt na tatheti cet---na, āśrayānabhibhave teṣāmanabhibhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:431: svāśrayaṃ prāgdeśād vibhajya deśāntaraṃ prāpayat karma tattāyāṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:436: dravyāsamavetaṃ hyadravyasamavetaṃ vā, asamavetameva vā syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_2u:437: ubhayathāpi guṇave vyāghātaḥ, sāmānyavataḥ svatantrasya dravyatvāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:440: guṇakarmaṇāṃ nirguṇatayā guṇasya tatra samavāyavirodhena tatsamavāye sāmānyarūpatvopapatterityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:442: hetuṃ sādhayati---na mana iti teṣāṃ viśeṣaguṇavirahāt sāmānyaguṇo 'yaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:449: tacca rūpitvaṃ gaganapavanābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaṃ cākṣuṣaguṇasaṃbandhamapi vyāvartayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:450: nāpi tejasaḥ tadguṇatvaṃ hi pratītau tadavirodhitvena vyāptam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:456: ayamarthaḥ, na tāvat chāyā tejaso rūpametadrūpasya śuklabhāsvaratvaniyamātṛ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:459: tathā ca cakṣuṣopalabhyamānaṃ na rūpamanantarbhāvyopalabdhuṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:462: ayamarthaḥ, cakṣurmātragrāhyatayā tāvacchāyā na guṇāntaratvena śaṅkāspadam, rūpaṃ tu saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:468: na ca yatsahitasya yasya yatra sāmarthyaṃ tadrahitena tena tatkaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:471: etena pārthivaṃ rūpamāropitaṃ tama iti nirastam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:472: bāhyālokasahakārivirahe cakṣuṣastathārope 'pyasāmarthyāt tadeva hi dharmyantare vā samāropyeta pittapītimavat,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:473: tatraiva vā niyatadeśe 'vagamyamāne aniyatadeśatvamiti nedīyasyaṇīyasyapi mahattvavat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:497: sa ca niṣedhyādanekadravyānnivartamānā svavyāpyaṃ sparśarahitatvaṃ gṛhītvā tadviparīte viśrāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:508: tasmād yadyārambhakasvabhāvatvaṃ manasastadā kadācidārambhe prayojanamapi kiñcid bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:512: pratyakṣabādhastu tadā syāt yadi tama evāpahnūyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:517: evaṃ tarhi raktādivyavahāro 'pi prasajyata iti cet---na, vyavahāre hi sati nimittānusmaraṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:518: na tu nimittāmastītyeva vyavahāraḥ yathā śaṣayoḥ śavyavahāro gauḍānāṃ varṇatvanimittāviśeṣe 'pi na kādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:520: tat kiṃ na kiñcidevac chāyetyata āha---tasmād bhābhāva evac chāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:522: so 'pi kathamālokamantareṇa pratiyogismaraṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇavirahe vidhimukhena cākṣuṣo viṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:525: tadihāpyālokābhāve tadālokāpekṣā syāt, yadyāloke 'pi tadapekṣā bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:527: pratyuta virodha eva tasmin sati hi tadabhāva eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:528: kiṃ tatsāpekṣeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyeta divā ca pratiyoginaḥ prabhāmaṇḍalasya grahe eva pradeśāntare tadgrahaṇamiti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:534: adhikaraṇam api dṛṣṭamanumitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā ihedānīmandhakāra iti pratyayāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:536: na hi nāprayogamātreṇa vidhitvam, pralayavināśāvasthānādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:538: ihāpi mātsaryamapanīya eṣaiva rītiranugamyatāmiti suṣṭhūpasaṃhṛtam---tasmād bhābhāva evac chāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:540: na tu deśāntaradarśanaprayuktam tacca prayojakamiha niścitavyāvṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:541: tathā hi svātantrayeṇa deśāntaraprāptau vārakānuvidhānaniyamo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:542: prabhātulyatve tejaḥprabhāśrayeṣu ratnaviśeṣeṣuc chāyā divase na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:543: chāyayaivābhibhave vā bahalatame tamasi teṣāmāloko na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:553: tathāpi na tāvat svarūpata āśrayato vā tatrāsiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyate, tayorniścitatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:554: nāpyupādhita upādhyapekṣayā vyabhicārāderlaghupratipattikatvāt, upādhestu taddvāraiva pratipatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:555: yadi ca tena dūṣayituṃ na śakyate taddvārāpyapādhirevodbhāvyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:558: upādhau tu kadācid vipratipadyate, tasya durūhatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:559: astu tarhi savyabhicāravat aprayojako nāma ṣaṣṭho hetvābhāsaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:565: tasmād viśeṣāntarābhāvāt, sādhyasamasamānalakṣaṇavattvācca tatraiva tasyāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:567: vārttike satī chāyā gatimatī deśāntare darśanāditi viśeṣaṇadvārā āśrayāsiddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:569: tadetāvanta evāsiddhabhedā iti bhramanirāsārthamudāharati---ta eta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:576: atra yathāśrutabhāṣyavārttikadarśanāt sarvamasamañjasamiti mattvā svavyākhyāṃ sthānāntarīyabhāṣyādyupanyāsena saṃvadannāha---atretyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:581: hetugrāhakapramāṇabādhastu, jalānilāviṣṇau pṛthivīto viparītasparśavatvāt tejovaditi pratyakṣeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:591: atha virodhasyaiva prathamaṃ buddhāvupanipātāt tadudbhāvanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatvasyodbhāvayitumaśakyatvācca so 'vaśyābhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:594: atha yadyayamartho bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitaḥ, kimiti naitadanurūpamudāharaṇamityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:596: athaitadudāharaṇaṃ svamate pañcakoṭiṣu kvāntarbhaviṣyatītyata āha---sa punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:606: atha sādhanavādī pramādī prativādī vā saduttarasamādhānayoraparisphūrtau tayorvijigīṣuḥ tadābhāsamapi brūyāditi tadābhāsavyutpādanāvasaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:607: tatrāpi jāteḥ svapakṣavyāghātāpādakatvena jaghanyatvāt chalasya tu tātparyato duṣṭatve 'pi vacanato 'duṣṭattvādasphūrtidaśāyāmapi tadeva prayoktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:608: tasyāpyasphūrtau jātiriti viśeṣajñāpanārthaṃ jāteḥ pūrvaṃ chaloddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:611: arthavaicitryopapattyā vacanavighātasya jātāvapi saṃbhavādityata āha---yathā vakturiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:612: iha vāgvṛttiviparyāsena pratyavasthānaṃ na tu tatreti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:613: nanu vibhāgo nodāhṛtaḥ tatkathaṃ vibhāge tūdāharaṇānīti bhāṣyamityata āha---vibhajyata iti // 10 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:616: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ vibhāgaśceti kṛtvā vibhāgasūtrameva paṭhatītyata āha---vibhajyate 'neneti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:626: tadyathā bhūbhṛdayaṃ vīryaśālī mahāvayavattvādityatra dharmipadasaṃcāreṇa na nakhaprasūnāñcitakarapallavo 'yaṃ nityakarmakaratvādityatra sādhyapadasaṃcāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:639: tad yathā, anyathāsiddho 'siddhaśceti vyāghātaḥ kathamapi siddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:643: asya pratyavasthānamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na pūrvasūtravyākhyānaṃ nottarasūtraparaṃ vetyata āha---tadetacchalamiti // 1.2 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:652: kvacit tu hetutvoddeśaviśeṣaṇeṣu yathā brāhmaṇādupajāto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:654: tadetat sarvaṃ vivakṣitamāpnoti cātyeti cobhayasamānaṃ cetyatisāmānyamucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:658: dvitīyaṃ tu, anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādityukte dhaṭo 'pyanityaḥ tarhi kṛtakatvāt śabdaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:660: śataṃ dvijātayo bhojitā ityukte śatasaṃkhyāvacchinnā api bhojitāḥ sanakādayo na dvijātaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:661: caturthaṃ tu, brāhmaṇājjāto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇatvādityukte saṃbhāvanāviṣayo 'yamabhihito na heturiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:662: pañcamaṃ tu, anityaṃ kāryamanityatvādityukte sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:663: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu, dvijaśataṃ bhojitamityukte dvijā bhojitāḥ, na tu tadmatā śatasaṃkhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:678: ye krośanti te dhvanihetavo yathā mañcāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:683: tadyathā, aśarīratvāditi heturayamāśrayāsiddha ityukte naivam, hetvāśrayasyākāśasya siddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:684: na ca heturasiddhatvādīnā dūṣyate api tu liṅgameva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:685_0: ato niranuyojyānuyogo bhavata ityādi dharmavikalpanirdeśaśabdenābhidhānadharmo dvedhābhidhīyata
GSP29nvtp1_2u:685_1: iti vārttikaikavākyatām āpādayituṃ bhūmiṃ racayitvā yathāśrutabhāṣyamupekṣya khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:686: dyayapi neha sphuṭam tathāpyekatra vastusadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:691: saṃgatirhi dvedhā bhavavati, antarbhāvalakṣaṇā ānantaryalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:692: tatra na tāvat pūrvā chalaparīkṣāsūtrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasyādhyāyārthatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:702: chalaparīkṣājātyādilakṣaṇasūtrāṇāṃ prakṛtopayogyekakāryāyogena tannibandhanāya api saṃgaterabhāvādityata āha---parīkṣāparvaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:706: parīkṣitaṃ satsu vivacitaṃ sugrahaṃ supariharaṃ chalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti parīkṣāprayojanaṃ sphuṭīkṛtya pūrvapakṣamāha---yathā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:716: vārttikaṃ tu ekatra dharmaḥ pratiṣidhyate 'nyatra dharmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:718: na hyatra mañcā eva dharmiṇaḥ pratiṣidhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:723: sarvavyāpakaṃ tu mukhyopacāravṛttyanugatatvena anayorbhedakau niyatau dharmāviti // 1.6 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:733: tathāpi pratijñāhānyādernigrahasthānasyāpi tathābhāvāt tāṃ saṃgatimupekṣyārthadūṣaṇatvābhiprāyeṇa prayogasya sāmyāduttaraprakaraṇa evāntarbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:734: tatrāntarbhūtāyāśca jāteḥ pṛthakkaraṇe uddeśa eva prayojanamuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:738: chalasya samyagdūṣaṇasya ca ityupalakṣaṇam, pratijñāhānyāderityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:741: tasyāpi hetuto vaidharmyeṇa hetvābhāsasādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānarūpatvādityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:742: ayaṃ ca mātraśabdārtho jātīnāmavatāraṃ vāde pratiṣedhatā asaduttaratvakhyāpanenaiva sūtrakṛtā sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:750: aparāddho hi nigrahaṃ śāstiṃ khalīkāraṃ prāpnoti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:757: tena kathāyāṃ pravṛttayāṃ vādinoratattvajñānajñāpikā kriyā nigrahasthānamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:766: yato vipratipadyamānaḥ prāptaparājayo bhavati, ataḥ parājayaprāptidvāreṇa unnetuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:767: atha parājayaprāptireva kā ityata uktam---nigrahasthānaṃ pratijñāhānyādi khalu spaṣṭam parājayaprāptiriti bhāṣyaṃ sphuṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:776: prathamata eva vyatikramādityata āha---yathālakṣaṇaṃ yathāsvarūpamityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:778: ārthyā vṛttyā prathamasūtrasya uddeśāntarbhāve 'pi dvitīyasūtramalagnakam asaṃgatikatvādityata āha---tasmāditi /
